channel.title: PERFECT actor to play G-Man!
channel.description:
After having watched The Human Centipede, I believe that German actor Dieter Laser would be the ideal casting choice to portray the G-Man in the hypothetical Half-Life major motion picture.
Just from observing his mannerisms and facial expressions, I feel he could easily exude the creepiness and mysterious nature of such a character...
Agree? Disagree? I'd like to know any comments or opinions you may have on this subject matter.
[img]https://mediamikes.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/drheiter.jpg[/img]
[img]https://www.arcadiumentertainment.com/film/actors/Dieter-Laser%20profile%20pic.jpg[/img]
[img]https://www.wearysloth.com/Gallery/ActorsL/33049-29546.jpg[/img]
